masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I was doing laundry and I found... something interesting in your hamper. Want to explain why you have a spandex outfit with a MASK? Is this a phase? A costume party? Because it looks awfully similar to that hero I saw on the news. I'm waiting."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Explain the costume without revealing the truth
  • Mom is not an idiotâ€”she knows something's up
  • Decide how much truth she can handle
